about_the_game:
"Uncanny Labyrinth" is a limited space survival game that uniquely combines the characteristics of survival, horror, puzzle solving and maze adventure games.
Players will wake up in a wild jungle without any clues. From the gaps in the leaves, they can see that they are surrounded by tall walls. The walls will open at dawn and close after entering the night.
Players should try their best to collect enough supplies and establish their own stronghold in this relatively safe forest. When you are fully prepared, enter the maze full of unknown dangers, collect more important materials, solve complex puzzles, make marks, and try to extend your footprints as far as possible.
But remember, unless you are completely prepared, escape to a safe area before night falls!
The dangerous areas of darkness will break your spirit! And the extremely low visibility will make it difficult for you to move!
Whether it’s exploring step by step or trying to survive in a dangerous zone in the warrior version,
Try to see if you can survive this uncanny maze and escape.

The trial version will only open one danger zone and one safe zone as an experience test.

The official version will realize a maze with a completely open degree of freedom, with each area connected, and there are endless areas to explore in all directions. And these levels are not procedurally generated, but are carefully designed by the designers bit by bit. The plot of the game will be unfolded in fragments through many clues, and you can find a way to completely escape the maze.

Players will wake up in a wild jungle without any clues. From the gaps in the leaves, they can see that they are surrounded by tall walls. The walls will open at dawn and close after entering the night.

The dangerous areas of darkness will break your spirit! And the extremely low visibility will make it difficult for you to move!
Whether it’s exploring step by step or trying to survive in a dangerous zone in the warrior version,

developers: 崔资坦独立游戏工作室
name: Uncanny Labyrinth Demo
publishers: 崔资坦独立游戏工作室
short_description: "Uncanny Labyrinth" is a limited space survival game that uniquely combines the characteristics of survival, horror, puzzle and maze adventure games. Players will appear in the center of an unknown maze without any clues. Try to see if you can survive and escape from this strange maze.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
